main event: A sighting of unidentified flying objects was reported on August 10, 1963, in Fairfield, Illinois.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about two hours,The objects were described as multiple and moving in various directions,Some witnesses claimed to have seen the objects through binoculars,The Air Force concluded that the objects could likely be explained as balloons or misinterpretations of searchlights,One witness reported a discoidal shape with flashing lights exhibiting erratic movement.
witness description: Witnesses described peculiar lights moving erratically in the sky.
